page.description: Read bytes from socket into string without removing the bytes from the socket stream.

argument.name: Data
argument.description: Binary data returned from the socket.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: The number of bytes of data to read.

page.discussion: The .PEEK() method reads the specified number of bytes from the socket, but does not remove the data that has been read from the socket buffer. This allows you to see if there is data in the socket buffer before you actually read (and therefore) remove it.
